name: Ludum Dare 42
description:
Find 4 keys in order to stop 4 walls that is about to crush you!
Unfortunately you can only carry one at a time, so hurry up scattering through the maze.
Drop them off in the middle in order to stop the walls, before you run out of space!

This game was made in under 48 hours in Ludum Dare 42.
Created by Brallex
